abiDocs.name: approve
abiDocs.details: Sets approved amount of tokens for spender. Returns success.
abiDocs.notice: Allows `_spender` to transfer `_value` tokens from `msg.sender` to any address.

inputs.name: _from
inputs.description: Address from where tokens are withdrawn.

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: Address to where tokens are sent.

abiDocs.name: transferFrom
abiDocs.details: Allows for an approved third party to transfer tokens from one address to another. Returns success.
abiDocs.notice: Transfer `_value` tokens from `_from` to `_to` if `msg.sender` is allowed.

abiDocs.name: balanceOf
abiDocs.details: Returns number of tokens owned by the given address.

abiDocs.name: transfer
abiDocs.details: Transfers sender's tokens to a given address. Returns success.

inputs.name: _data
inputs.description: Data to be sent to tokenFallback

abiDocs.name: transfer
abiDocs.details: Function that is called when a user or another contract wants to transfer funds.
abiDocs.notice: Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from `msg.sender` and trigger tokenFallback if sender is a contract.

abiDocs.name: allowance
abiDocs.details: Returns number of allowed tokens that a spender can transfer on behalf of a token owner.
